text: No it's not in the Fetch drop down either, although I think it still fetches it anyway

Hello everyone! Does anyone know if it is possible to save a web page you have been working on as a HubL template or at least be able to extract a file containing all of the HubL and html that makes up a page you have been building in the page editor? I think it would be a lot easier to start by creating a super bare bones template, add the sections of a template in the actual visual page editor, and then use that as the final template.
Sorry if this isn't clear! Having trouble formulating the question.
Ok working on this - fix should be out in the next week

Hello everyone, just a quick question to ask... I have an email template that has already been published in marketplace. I wanted to make some modification in the description of the template, while I tried saving it. It shows a popup (a screenshot has been attached for your reference). Can anyone help me with this.
